translation.Name: Audio Tape (Daucus Sativus #1)
translation.Description:
An audio tape diary.
Inspect To Play Audio Recording

"Things around the lab started feeling a lot more tense as of late, a lot more eerie after the Kirie incident- and it only gets worse the more we…create. I’ve lost countless friends and lab partners due to them- and I know why we keep them around, but I truly wish it wasn’t the case. What we need is solutions, and we need them now."
